onboarding.subject: how to integrate AI tools into my product management workflow
onboarding.why: I'm a PM and I keep seeing other PMs ship faster using AI. I feel like I'm falling behind and I want to be the person who actually knows this stuff.
onboarding.summary: PM wants to learn AI integration for product workflows to keep pace with peers

profiling.current_level: beginner - knows AI exists, has used ChatGPT, but no systematic understanding
profiling.vocabulary: non-technical, business-oriented. Knows PM jargon but not AI/ML terminology
skip: basic explanation of what AI is
profiling.depth: practical and applied, not theoretical. Wants to DO things, not understand how models work
profiling.tone: casual, direct, no hand-holding but also not condescending. Treat them like a smart person who just hasn't learned this yet
profiling.background: 3 years as PM at mid-size SaaS. Comfortable with data and analytics. Uses Notion, Linear, Figma daily
gaps: doesn't know which AI tools exist beyond ChatGPT
no framework for evaluating when AI is useful vs overkill
strengths: high motivation and clear use case
profiling.focus_areas: tool selection, workflow integration, prompt engineering, measuring AI impact on velocity
profiling.learner_context: Works on a product team that's skeptical of AI. Wants to become the internal expert and champion
